content.query:
SELECT DISTINCT
            * 
        FROM 
            [dbo].[DimCustomers] dcust
        JOIN
            [ext].[Customers] cust
            ON dcust.LastName = cust.LastName
            AND dcust.FirstName = cust.FirstName
            AND dcust.ZipCode = cust.ZipCode
            AND dcust.City = cust.City
            AND dcust.State = cust.State
        WHERE
            'B14EA582-B33C-4143-8A4C-BFF86096329A' = cust.SourceSystemCustomerID


			SELECT * FROM ext.rentals
